summary: An ordinance of the City of Seattle accepting deed dated February 6, 1914, from the Oregon and Washington Railroad Company, a corporation organized and existing under and by virtue of the laws of the State of Oregon and qualified to do business in the State of Washington, to the City of Seattle, a municipal corporation, in accordance with Ordinance No. 29580, of the City of Seattle, to the following described property situated in King County, State of Washington to- wit: beginning at the point on the north line of lot 7, block 8, Lawton Park Addition to the City of Seattle, distant 100.02 feet east of the Northwest corner of said lot 7; thence east along the north line a distance of 9.98 feet to the Northeast corner of said lot 7; thence south along the east line of said lot a distance of 6.82 feet; thence Northwesterly along a straight line a distance of 12.08 feet to a point of beginning, said tract of land containing 34 square feet more or less.
